Name: Dear Leader
About the game: Your glorious regime is under attack! Will you sit idly and eat burgers while the foreign invasion destroys your legacy? Or will you take the matter into your own hands, and deal with the invaders yourself? Dear Leader is an Action Run and Gun game, where you control Kim Jong Un, Pulgosauri the communist kaiju monster, and the Supreme Leader's secondary form. Key features 6 Levels 6 Different weapons 3 Playable Characters 2 Difficulty Levels, Easy and Normal Partial Gamepad Support 6 Languages.
